name: polythene
description: Polymer inspired modular implementation of Material Design for Mithril.

scripts.install-mdi: mkdir -p external_modules && rm -rf external_modules/MaterialDesign && cd external_modules && git clone git://github.com/Templarian/MaterialDesign
scripts.copy-deps: npm run copy-mdif && npm run copy-mdi && npm run copy-material-colors
scripts.postinstall: rm -rf external_modules && npm run install-mdif && npm run install-mdi && npm run copy-mdif && npm run copy-mdi && npm run copy-deps
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-es6
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-css && npm run transpile-js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf external_modules && rm -rf lib/deps/ && find ./lib -name "*.js" -not -name "*.es6.js" -print | xargs rm -rf && find ./lib -name "*.css" -print | xargs rm -rf

author: Arthur Clemens
